content:
I am currently an Associate Professor @ISEN Yncréa Ouest — previously @ENSTA Bretagne — with 7+ years of experience in Signal Processing dedicated to Acoustics.
I have lectured engineer-oriented courses for 4+ years, mostly in the fields of Computer Science, Electrical Engineering & Robotics.
